name: Tank & Mirror
description:
Goal of the game :

The aim of the game is to destroy the 3 enemies tank before you loose your own tanks.

Course of the game :

The players will start by placing their tanks each on their side of the board then validate the placement. The first player begins by placing 3 shot markers on his side of the field.Once the shots are valid, these markers are moved to the other side of the playing field by symmetry effect. If a shot hits an enemy tank, it is destroyed. Then the other player's turn begins.
